document_data.name: Mulan Dynasty
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mulan Dynasty''' ruled over the city-state of [[Westgate]] from the {{YearlinkName|-27}}, until {{YearlinkName|75}}. Their reign began when [[Ashtukzu I]] ousted the [[doppleganger]] posing as [[Ryndarth Soleilon II]] and claimed the throne for himself. The dynasty was named for their [[mulan]] heritage. Their rule was succeeded by their seneschal [[Kergaard Twinblade]].
document_data.Monarchs:
; King Ashtukzu I 
: Reigned {{Yearlink|-27}} – {{Yearlink|-8}}. Conqueror from [[Unther]] who declared Westgate's independence after claiming the throne. 
; King [[Thunn|Thunn "the Usurper"]] 
: Reigned {{Yearlink|-8}} – {{Yearlink|4}}. Cousin of Ashtukzu I who betrayed him to take the throne.
; King [[Ashtukzu II]] 
: Reigned {{Yearlink|4}} – {{Yearlink|37}}. Son and heir of Ashtukzu I who reclaimed the throne.
